contentrichtext.text: {{Use dmy dates|date=February 2013}} The '''USS Liberty Veterans Association''' (LVA or USS-LVA) is an organization of former crew members and survivors of the [[USS Liberty incident|USS ''Liberty'' incident]] on 8 June 1967. == Organizational structure == For 2010, the board of directors of the LVA consists of the following: *[[Joe Meadors]] — President *Stan White — Vice President *Rocky Sturman — Vice President *Bryce Lockwood — Vice President *Dave Lewis — Vice President == See also == * [[USS Liberty (AGTR-5)|USS ''Liberty'']] * [[USS Liberty incident]] == External links == * [http://www.usslibertyveterans.org/ USS Liberty Veterans Association] * [http://www.gtr5.com/ USS Liberty Memorial] [[Category:American veterans' organizations]] {{US-org-stub}}
